0.text: Bug 7330  Make more actions available on text selection.

1.text: I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to the Outline view.

2.text: I expected the action to be 1. in the context menu and if not 2. in the Edit (or some other global) menu  I think currently we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis.

4.text: It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not (OK - not all need to be in the context menu but all must be reachable from the editor e.g.

6.text: It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view.
